DataElement.preferredName: University of Washington Quality of Life Questionnaire Most Important Issues Past 7 Days Appearance 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated perception of their appearance in the past seven days, using a 5 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: University of Washington Quality of Life Questionnaire Most Important Issues Past 7 Days Appearance
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to assess health-related quality of life in head and neck cancer patients._A question about a person's most important health issues._The most recent week, including today._The outward or visible aspect of a person or thing.

ObjectClass.preferredName: University of Washington Quality of Life Scale, Version 4
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to assess health-related quality of life in head and neck cancer patients.

Concepts.longName: University of Washington Quality of Life Scale, Version 4
Concepts.definition: A questionnaire designed to assess health-related quality of life in head and neck cancer patients.

Property.preferredName: Most Important Issue Past Week Appearance
Property.preferredDefinition: A question about a person's most important health issues.:The most recent week, including today.:The outward or visible aspect of a person or thing.

Concepts.definition: A question about a person's most important health issues.
The most recent week. May include the present day.
The outward or visible aspect of a person or thing.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.origin: UWQoLv4:University of Washington Quality of Life Scale, Rogers S.N., and Lowe D., Version 4, 1999
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for NRG study in Rave per request by V.Patel. mc 5/16/14

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard of five responses from no change in appearance to cannot be with people due to appearance.

PermissibleValues.value: I cannot be with people due to my appearance.
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Cannot Be With People Due to Appearance

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Cannot Be With People Due to Appearance
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual feels that they cannot be with other people due to a change in their appearance.

Concepts.longName: Cannot Be With People Due to Appearance
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual feels that they cannot be with other people due to a change in their appearance.

PermissibleValues.value: I feel significantly disfigured and limit my activities due to my appearance.
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Feel Significantly Disfigured and Limit Activities Due to Appearance

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Feel Significantly Disfigured and Limit Activities Due to Appearance
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual feels disfigured and that this change in their appearance limits their activities.

Concepts.longName: Feel Significantly Disfigured and Limit Activities Due to Appearance
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual feels disfigured and that this change in their appearance limits their activities.

PermissibleValues.value: My appearance bothers me but I remain active.
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Bothered by Appearance but Remain Active

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Bothered by Appearance but Remain Active
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is bothered by a change in their appearance but that they remain active.

Concepts.longName: Bothered by Appearance but Remain Active
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is bothered by a change in their appearance but that they remain active.

PermissibleValues.value: The change in my appearance is minor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has or had a minor change in their appearance.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has or had a minor change in their appearance.

PermissibleValues.value: There is no change in my appearance.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has or had no change in their appearance.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has or had no change in their appearance.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created for NRG study in Rave per request by V.Patel. mc 5/16/14
